title: 2BR, 1BA: Modern Design, Wired, Nice Ocean View
posting_body: Apartment sits on a very charming neighborhood at Golden Gate Heights / Inner Sunset.
You'll experience San Francisco living with lots of convenience within walking distance and easy public transportation yet be able to relax in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood when you need it.
You will also enjoy a beautiful view of the Pacific Ocean!
Apartment has a newly remodeled kitchen and bathroom and is furnished with a modern design and features plenty of natural sunlight throughout.
Key Features:
Plenty of sunlight and natural light throughout
Both bedrooms have large closets and large windows
Large living room with plenty of sunlight
Kitchen has granite counter-tops and new appliances
Plenty of closet and extra storage
Bathroom has shower
Hardwood floors throughout
Shared coin-op laundry machines in building
Convenience Features:
Plenty of free all day street parking
Plenty of restaurants within a 10-15 minute walk
66-Muni stops right in front (to UCSF, Downtown)
28-Muni is 3 blocks away
N-Judah is 4 blocks away
Tenant pays PG&E utilities and water.
Well-behaved animals allowed.
No smoking in apartment or building.
One driveway parking included and street parking is easy.
No elevator in building.
TERMS: Must move in within 30 days.
6 month term then month to month.
Tenant pays PG&E and water
MOVE-IN FEES:
First month rent (will pro-rate for partial month), Last month rent deposit, and $2000 security deposit.
If interested, please provide your name, email and phone # in the reply email.
If you do not provide contact info, your email will be disregarded.
